item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Lol, I just noticed on the page that it says you get yuri at 50k plus spent at party wheel.

Perhaps the formatting could use a tweak to make this more obvious?

item.title: Additional Yuri Location
item.content:encoded:
OK, so I just got Yuri from the Party wheel.

I just spinned the wheel.

My NEXT purchase on the wheel would be 1440 Ryo.

I got Dog Treats on this roll. (Common result)

It won't let me edit the page for some reason so I'm posting this in Discussion so we can get the page updated.

Can someone clarify why I can't edit the page?!?!
